---

#### Local Server Version

MoonNMR local version provides a similar experience as the online version hosted on shinyapps.io. In addition, the local version
This local version only has a single function to call -\> run_moonnmr(). Dependencies are automatically installed, so no other setup is necessary.

Simply run:

    library(MoonNMR)
    run_moonnmr()

---

For further information visit:
https://github.com/funkam/MoonNMR
